name: image_generation_agent
description: AI assistant that generates custom images for presentations, marketing materials, and business communications
useCases: Create images for personal projects and social media posts
Generate visuals for presentations and pitch decks quickly
Design marketing graphics without waiting for design team availability
Visualize product concepts for stakeholder feedback
samplePrompts: Professional e-commerce hero shot of a minimalist titanium water bottle on a textured white marble surface, studio key lighting with soft rim-light, macro focus on material detail, 85mm lens, 1:1 aspect ratio.

A high-end editorial magazine cover featuring a futuristic organic chair in a brutalist concrete hall, cinematic blue hour lighting, wide-angle 24mm perspective, sharp architectural textures, 3:4 aspect ratio.

A scroll-stopping social media visual for a healthy snack brand: vibrant split-screen composition showing fresh tropical fruits on one side and the packaged product on the other, hyper-saturated colors, energetic top-down lighting, 9:16 aspect ratio.

A serene Scandinavian interior visualization of a sun-drenched reading nook, realistic wood and linen textures, soft window light with dust motes, 35mm lens, eye-level perspective, peaceful atmosphere.
A technical exploded-view diagram of a vintage mechanical camera, clean isometric perspective, high-key neutral lighting, precise component detail on a slate grey background.
author: Albert Folch
